rooms.description: A large open area for joint family gatherings and communal activities.
Traditional Kerala style kitchen with a Vastu-compliant south-eastern entrance.
Spacious bedroom with balcony on the western side for enhanced natural light and ventilation.
Second bedroom with a spacious balcony facing north-west to ensure proper flow of energy.
Third bedroom featuring an extended balcony for relaxation and view; positioned in the eastern sector.
Fourth bedroom with a dedicated balcony facing north to enhance positive Vastu elements.
Fifth bedroom incorporating an expansive balcony on the southern side for ventilation and light according to Vastu guidelines.
Additional guest room integrated within the space, with a small balcony that respects traditional Kerala aesthetics.
